features: Advanced Importing Method:Effortlessly bring in your academic data with an advanced importing method, ensuring a smooth transition of information into your Student OS 2.0.; Enhanced Automatic Grade Calculator:Gain a deeper understanding of your academic performance with an improved grade calculator.; Cleaner Interface:Experience a sleek and organized interface that enhances clarity, making it easier than ever to manage your academic and personal tasks in one centralized location.; Advanced Filter:Navigate through your courses and assignments with precision using an advanced filtering system, allowing you to focus on specific tasks; Quick Access Buttons:Accelerate your efficiency with quick access buttons, providing instant entry to essential features and tools, saving you valuable time.
